text: Robert Gray, also known as Bobby Gray (18 June 1927 – 25 October 2018) was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Wishaw Juniors and Lincoln City as a winger. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Wishaw Juniors F.C. players Category:Lincoln City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football wingers
title: Robert Gray (footballer, born 1927)
